item.title: CVE-2024-31258|2024-04-07T17:44:40.480Z -- Micro.company -- Form to Chat App
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Micro.Company Form to Chat App allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Form to Chat App: from n/a through 1.1.6.
